data.name: SpunkStock: Music Festival
data.detailed_description:
SpunkStock involves a simple, yet diverse system as it's core gameplay. Create your own playstyle by selecting various "modifiers" to shape how you play. Explore and get to know unique characters with fully animated scenes.

Diverse Modifier System

Choose between 20+ unique modifiers to shape your experience. You can choose modifiers that support you, or choose modifiers that are challenging, but offer greater rewards. You can keep things simple, or stack modifiers together and create some very challenging results. It's up to you.

A Festival Where Sex Is An Avid theme

Sneak backstage in a festival, and build relationships with the artists. Every artist will have a fully animated base scene, additional optional Hcontent, and variations.

Get Rewards With Various Currencies

Completing songs will reward you with Reputation. Mastering a song will reward you with tokens. These can all be used in a shop to unlock various Quest items, cosmetics, or Pin-ups for your viewing pleasure.

Various Endings

SpunkStock will have ending variations depending on your relationships with the cast of characters.

Mini-games

Take a break with one of the mini-games across SpunkStock. Including a platforming section, a haunted hall, and various other arcs with unique mechanics.

data.short_description: Sneak backstage in a well known music festival. Use unique, and diverse rhythm game mechanics to build your relationships with the artists. Build your own play style and difficulty through the game's "modifier" system. SpunkStock features fully animated scenes for each artist.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains a lot of sexual acts. Small amounts of "furry".
